name: Peppy Cat
description:
[About]
Peppy Cat is very peppy. He often runs to garden to play with bubbles. Be careful to keep off the black bubbles, unless Peppy Cat has popped all the color bubbles.

[How To Play]
Tap anywhere to jump.
Tap more times rapidly to jump higher.
Pop the color bubbles.
Get as many levels as you can.

Hope you enjoy this Peppy Cat :)
Thank you!
